analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x690776940f101a0b894154e7a99c531849151053.sol:
	Contract IziCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x690776940f101a0b894154e7a99c531849151053.sol#209-212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x690776940f101a0b894154e7a99c531849151053.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.4.22<0.6.0 (/unique_chucks/10/0x690776940f101a0b894154e7a99c531849151053.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0x690776940f101a0b894154e7a99c531849151053.sol#54-55) is not in mixedCase
